## 1 Basic R Computation

```{r}
1 + 1 
```

```{r}
a <- 5
b <- 2
```

```{r}
a + b # addition
```

```{r}
a - b # subtruction
```

```{r}
a * b # multiplication
```

```{r}
a / b # division
```

```{r}
total <- a + b
print(total)
```

```{r}
sum(a, b)
```

```{r}
total == sum(a, b)
```

```{r}
total == a - b
```

```{r}
c(5, 8)
```

```{r}
all <- c(a, b, total)
print(all)
```
